channel.title: Axoloti 1.0.11- poll
channel.description:
Please could you 'vote' for any platform that you **have installed and use Axoloti 1.0.11** on.
please only include actively used platforms. my hope is this will give us a feel for the number of users who have upgraded for each platform.
thought, Id keep it 'general' for now, but may be in the future we extend the list to different variants of windows/linux/mac.
note: the main discussion thread for 1.0.11 is [here](http://community.axoloti.com/t/axoloti-release-1-0-11/2167/46)
[poll name=install1011 type=multiple] - Windows - Mac OS X - Linux [/poll]
